title: Wood Brothers Tickets CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Wood Brothers Tickets for their 2015 Tour Dates for Cities like Chicago Charlotte Atlanta and Macon
text:
(MENAFN Press) concert tickets for their 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Chicago Charlotte Atlanta and Macon. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Wood Brothers fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Wood Brothers tickets at affordable prices. Wood Brothers are hitting the road in 2015 and kicking it all off on October 27th in Baltimore MD.
The band will be out in support of their new album Paradise.
to browse all levels of seating for Wood Brothers concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
There isn't an event you will see this year that has the same exciting atmosphere as a live Wood Brothers concert.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
